basics.name: Luke Shafer
basics.label: Full-Stack Web Developer
basics.summary: Hi! I'm a web developer with over 5 years of experience in tech. I've worked across in all sorts of corners of tech - developing desktop software, frontend site code, and backend server code, as well as IT support and customer implementations.

work.name: Luke Shafer Web Design
work.description: Self-owned web development and design freelance business
work.summary: Luke Shafer Web Design is a web design and development company based in Columbus, Ohio. I work with clients to create beautiful, accessible, and modern websites and web applications.
highlights: Built 4 full client websites, 2 Discord bots, and a game in under 6 months

work.name: TrueCommerce, Inc
work.summary: Worked as project manager for implementation projects, intregrating customer ERP software with the TrueCommerce EDI network.
highlights: Led over 100 implementation projects and cases to completion
Partnered with customers to build business-driven solutions

work.name: CodeWizardsHQ
work.summary: Led curriculum-based courses online to students in grades 3-12.
highlights: Taught 5 simultaneous 12-week courses to students with no prior experience

volunteer.summary: Co-founded a character volunteer organization, which brings famous and beloved characters to children and families in Central Ohio.

references.name: Leonard Mack
references.reference:
I had the pleasure of hiring and managing Luke during my time at True Commerce. 

Luke was a consummate professional at all times. His work ethic was impeccable and Luke consistently gave 100% to his work and the customers he served. He never hesitated when asked to complete a task. He was a critical member of the team's success. 

He is a reliable professional, and during stressful times was a positive influence on the team. When things needed to get done, he was always willing to dive in and do the work.I

projects.name: Fridge Magnets
projects.description: Online party/word game, based on the card game Ransom Notes

projects.name: Luke Shafer Web Design
projects.description: Statically generated business site using SvelteKit
